text: Etsyena was a town of ancient Phrygia, inhabited during Roman times. Its name does not occur in ancient authors, but is inferred from epigraphic and other evidence. Its site is located near Bayat in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in Phrygia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Afyonkarahisar Province
title: Etsyena
